subject: Boxing
Assaults
lead_paragraph: The boxer Rola El-Halabi was shot in her dressing room in Berlin by her stepfather before a title fight, leaving her with injuries to her hand, knee and feet, the police said.
snippet: The boxer Rola El-Halabi was shot in her dressing room in Berlin by her stepfather before a title fight, leaving her with injuries to her hand, knee and feet, the police said.
